Html:
hi

i have followed the guides in this forum to remove the brackets in citations and also made used of macros to superscript the citations. Unfortunately, there is still spacing before the citation numbers.

eg.
Astigmatism is usually WTR 1. ----I am getting this where there is a spacing before the number.
